titles.title: Temporary Payroll Tax Cut Continuation Act of 2012
To continue the employee payroll tax cut through 2012.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/13/2012--Introduced. Temporary Payroll Tax Cut Continuation Act of 2012 - Amends the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010 to extend through 2012 the 2% reduction in employment tax rates for employees and self-employed individuals.
